* Qualcomm Technologies, Inc. MSM CSIPHY Remote

=======================
Required Node Structure
=======================
The remote CSIPHY node is described in the first level of device nodes.

======================================
First Level Node - CSIPHY Remote device
======================================
- cell-index
  Usage: required
  Value type: <u32>
  Definition: Should specify the HW ID

- compatible
  Usage: required
  Value type: <string>
  Definition: Should specify the compatibility strings

Example:

cam_csiphy_remote0 {
	cell-index = <0>;
	compatible = "qcom,csiphy-remote-v1.2.1", "qcom,csiphy-remote";
	status = "ok";
};
